$documentation.purpose: Registry of user types (personas) identified during discovery. User types represent distinct roles with unique needs, workflows, and pain points.
$documentation.phase_position: Supporting registry - populated alongside pain points and JTBDs

key_attributes.items[].id: User type identifier following UT-{NN} pattern
key_attributes.items[].name: Human-readable persona name
key_attributes.items[].source: Source document where persona was defined

validation_rules: All personas referenced in JTBDs MUST exist in this registry
Each persona MUST have at least one JTBD associated
Primary personas MUST have corresponding screens in screen_registry

description: Registry of User Types (Personas) with traceability
